action.des: Defensive Substitution: Jason Smith replaces shortstop Miguel Tejada, batting 3rd, playing shortstop.
Darin Erstad remains in the game as the first baseman.
Pitcher Change: Jose Valverde replaces Tim Byrdak, batting 5th, replacing first baseman Geoff Blum.
Defensive Substitution: Hunter Pence replaces right fielder Jason Michaels, batting 6th, playing right field.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Eric Eymann replaces Paul Janish.

atbat.des: Eric Eymann lines out to third baseman Chris Johnson.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Wilkin Castillo replaces Ryan Hanigan.

atbat.des: Wilkin Castillo pops out to third baseman Chris Johnson.

action.des: Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Chris Kroski replaces Homer Bailey.
Defensive Substitution: Adam Greenberg replaces center fielder Darnell McDonald, batting 1st, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Shaun Cumberland replaces left fielder Jonny Gomes, batting 4th, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Luis Bolivar replaces second baseman Chris Valaika, batting 6th, playing second base.
Eric Eymann remains in the game as the shortstop.
Wilkin Castillo remains in the game as the catcher.
Pitcher Change: Mike Lincoln replaces Homer Bailey, batting 9th.

atbat.des: Michael Bourn singles on a bunt ground ball to first baseman Adam Rosales.
Chris Johnson triples (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Adam Greenberg. Michael Bourn scores.
Reggie Abercrombie out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Adam Greenberg. Chris Johnson scores.
Humberto Quintero grounds out, shortstop Eric Eymann to first baseman Adam Rosales.
